notes: Light is a form of energy that enables us to see. When light falls on a surface, it can be reflected, absorbed, or transmitted. Laws of reflection: 1) The incident ray, reflected ray, and normal all lie in the same plane. 2) The angle of incidence equals the angle of reflection.

mcqs.q: The angle of incidence is equal to:
mcqs.explanation: According to the second law of reflection, angle of incidence = angle of reflection
